blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: La Famiglia
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2P4toU2

by athletiger

The Stark Family is one of the largest and strongest crime syndicates on American soil, infamously known for their ruthlessness and their tight-knit community. Government files report that they produce black-market weapons and do human trafficking. Because of their threat to the American people, FBI’s top priority is to find them and pin each and every one of their members for their crimes; success of this mission would mean another win for the American people, just as good of a win as the arrest of Al Capone.

However, for FBI Special Agent Steve Rogers, it’s more personal. Infiltrating the family would mean avenging Bucky’s death, who died in the line of fire as an undercover agent. And Steve plans on finishing what Bucky started.

Famiglia per sempre.

Words: 4492, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Clint Barton, Nick Fury, Maria Hill, Phil Coulson, Obadiah Stane
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Phil Coulson
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Mob, Hydra (Marvel), Angst, Organized Crime, Crimes & Criminals, Other Additional Tags to Be Added


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2P4toU2

title: Changing things
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2DK05Fa

by VanillaHorizon

A stirring in the MCU canon in which I change things up. Domestic Avengers? Sure lets throw that in the bowl. Irondad? Yes, perfect! Shuri, Peter and Harley becoming super friends? ADD THAT SHIT IN. Eventual Ironstrange? Fuck yeah! All while changing up the MCU events slightly so it all falls into place perfectly? I LOVE A CHALLENGE! Pour it all in the pan and ima bake some hella delicious fanfiction.

Words: 2607, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Doctor Strange (2016), Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America (Movies), Thor (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Il Piccolo Vampiro
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2L6Q6gk

by Spectra

“Hello, little one.” Jarvis smiled at him. His smile was a little tight, and he let out a jittery laugh one too many times, but the boy didn’t seem to mind. Encouraged by the fact that Tony hadn’t yet started wailing for his mother, Jarvis continued. “How old are you?”

“Three.” Tony told him in between thoughtful little chews on the tips of his fingers.

Jarvis found himself biting back a chuckle. “Oh, well, goodness me,” he spoke softly instead. “You’re a bigger boy than I thought.”

Edwin Jarvis has taken up a position at the Stark household looking after the Stark’s youngest - and only - son, Tony, which is a bigger learning curve than he’d first thought.

Words: 3605, Chapters: 1/13, Language: English

  • Fandoms:The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Avengers Team (MCU)
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Vampire Tony Stark, Monster Avengers, Halloween, Half-Vampire dynamics, Protective Tony Stark, Irondad, Possessive Behavior, Scenting, Mystery based plot, Father and Son, there will be blood - Freeform, There are vampires after all so, Blood Drinking, Blood and Gore, I’m tagging these all very harshly just in case, But they aren’t excessive, Osborn - Freeform, Mythical Beings & Creatures, Were-Creatures, Possibly incorrect Italian

blog.name: swapauanon
blog.title: SwapAUAnon's official blog
blog.description:
A mix of fandom, speculation, and rant stuff.
The only thing I'll post regarding the KH3 leaks is how to avoid them. Until I have my own copy of the game, this blog will only cover what was in the trailers.

summary: ... So I just realized that if Aunt May isn’t in Avengers 4 and Tony doesn’t break the bad news to her, then we’re seriously...
body:
…

So I just realized that if Aunt May isn’t in Avengers 4 and Tony doesn’t break the bad news to her, then we’re seriously wasting this plot point.

reblog.comment:
…

So I just realized that if Aunt May isn’t in Avengers 4 and Tony doesn’t break the bad news to her, then we’re seriously wasting this plot point.

trail.content_raw:
…

So I just realized that if Aunt May isn’t in Avengers 4 and Tony doesn’t break the bad news to her, then we’re seriously wasting this plot point.
trail.content:

tags: let's see how long i'll survive this year lmao
summary: Marveltober Day 1 - First Film My first MCU film was Iron Man 3, so here's a little Mark 42 ! You can guess how lost I was right...
caption:
Marveltober Day 1 - First Film

My first MCU film was Iron Man 3, so here’s a little Mark 42 ! You can guess how lost I was right ww 

I loved everything I saw though, since the suits and brilliant effects to Tony and his priceless sarcasm. It was my introduction to the Marvel universe and it was definitely an experience! To this day I love Tony a lot and seeing his development throughout the films was definitely one of the best things ever~

tags: I'm not actually sure I'll do every day but hey
title: Whumptober day 1: stabbed
body:
Tony pressed a trembling hand to the patched up wound in his side, staring at the place Thanos had vanished.

“Mr. Stark!” Peter called, hurrying to him. “Oh gosh, you’re hurt.”

“I’m fine, Pete,” Tony breathed. Peter skimmed his hands over Tony’s injury, his face slack with fear.

“You’re… you’re bleeding through the nanotech,” he murmured. Tony glanced down to his shredded armor.

“Yeah, looks like it.” Blood was slowly seeping into his jacket, turning the white nanotech spray pink.

Peter’s bottom lip trembled. “That’s ok, we can, um… we can patch you up, I’m sure the Guardians have… something they can use.”

Tony gave him a tight smile. “Not sure it’s worth the effort, bud. We lost.”

The Guardians and Strange were starting to gather near them. Peter’s breathing hitched.

“What’s going to happen now?” he asked quietly.

“I don’t know,” Tony admitted, raising a blood-stained hand and brushing his fingertips along Peter’s jaw. Peter swallowed, then seemed to steel himself. He braved a smile.

“Don’t worry, Mr. Stark. I’ll protect you.”

Tony wasn’t worried about himself in the slightest, but he breathed a laugh and bumped Peter’s chin with a knuckle. “I know you will, kid. Come on, help me up.”

Peter gently took Tony’s elbow and lifted him to his feet, steadying him. They looked around at their allies, knowing that they had failed, and waited for the world to end.

“Mr. Stark!” Peter called, hurrying to him. “Oh gosh, you’re hurt.”

“I’m fine, Pete,” Tony breathed. Peter skimmed his hands over Tony’s injury, his face slack with fear.

“You’re… you’re bleeding through the nanotech,” he murmured. Tony glanced down to his shredded armor.

“Yeah, looks like it.” Blood was slowly seeping into his jacket, turning the white nanotech spray pink.

Peter’s bottom lip trembled. “That’s ok, we can, um… we can patch you up, I’m sure the Guardians have… something they can use.”

Tony gave him a tight smile. “Not sure it’s worth the effort, bud. We lost.”

The Guardians and Strange were starting to gather near them. Peter’s breathing hitched.

“What’s going to happen now?” he asked quietly.

“I don’t know,” Tony admitted, raising a blood-stained hand and brushing his fingertips along Peter’s jaw. Peter swallowed, then seemed to steel himself. He braved a smile.

“Don’t worry, Mr. Stark. I’ll protect you.”

Tony wasn’t worried about himself in the slightest, but he breathed a laugh and bumped Peter’s chin with a knuckle. “I know you will, kid. Come on, help me up.”
